A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie. Random sub plots that are pointless with terrible humor. It looked cool but you can usher in a new age without destroying past characters. The treatment of Luke and perversion of his character made me never want to see another one of these movies again. Finn is a cool character that they use as a comic relief and really turn into a slightly better jar jar. In general this made me never want to see another Disney made star wars film ever again and really destroyed the awesome memories I had of this series. Bootleg guardians of the galaxy that isn't good.
